# Invitation to Tender 01B46-23-162

Building 136 Coller Retro-Fit Project – Central Experimental Farm

## Solicitation Details

* **Publication Date**: November 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 18, 2024

## Project Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a general contractor to undertake the Coller Retro-Fit project at its Central Experimental Farm, located at 960 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON K1A 0C6. The project scope includes the modernization of the refrigeration system for Building 136.

## Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit is scheduled for Tuesday, November 14, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST. Interested bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by emailing Jacques Toussaint at jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca by November 10, 2023, at 4:00 PM EST.

## Tender Period and Submissions

Tenders for the project will be accepted until the tender closing date and time indicated above. Submissions must be made through the CanadaBuy service provider platform.

## PROCUREMENT METHOD

This procurement is open to all qualified bidders. AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal, in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and to reject any or all proposals received.

## CONTACT INFORMATION

For any information related to this tender process, please contact:

Jacques Toussaint
Contract Officer
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
2001 Robert-Bourassa, Suite 671-TEN
Montreal, QC H3A 3N2
Phone: 438-455-8237
Email: jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca

## ATTACHMENTS

The tender notice and supporting documents are available on the CanadaBuy service provider platform at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24236/invitation-to-tender-01b46-23-162.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24236/appel-dofff
